benchmark_details.name: EMNLP (Educator-role Moral and Normative LLMs Profiling)
benchmark_details.overview: This paper introduces the EMNLP framework for personality profiling, moral development stage measurement, and ethical risk evaluation of LLMs in educational contexts, with a focus on teacher-role simulations.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the ethical and psychological alignment of teacher-role LLMs in the educational AI context.

data.source: Constructed dataset of moral dilemmas specific to the teaching profession.
data.annotation: Expert review and assessment by educational psychologists

methodology.calculation: Moral development stages evaluated against set moral dilemmas using expert ratings.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate stronger post-conventional moral reasoning.
methodology.validation: Expert rating confirmed by high inter-annotator agreement.

harm: Harmful content generation risk due to soft prompt injection.
